Package com.developersboard.shared.util.core

Class SecurityUtils

java.lang.Object
com.developersboard.shared.util.core.SecurityUtils
public final class SecurityUtils extends Object
This utility class holds custom operations on security used in the application.
Since:
1.0

    • configureDevEnvironmentAccess

      public static void configureDevEnvironmentAccess (org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.builders.HttpSecurity http, org.springframework.core.env.Environment environment) throws Exception

      Parameters:
      http - the http request
      environment - the environment
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error
